scripts.flatten-origin-master: SYNC_TYPE=1 MASTER=true npx hardhat run script/combine_zklink_abi.js
scripts.flatten-origin-slaver: SYNC_TYPE=1 MASTER=false npx hardhat run script/combine_zklink_abi.js
scripts.flatten-nexus-master: SYNC_TYPE=2 MASTER=true npx hardhat run script/combine_zklink_abi.js
scripts.flatten-nexus-slaver: SYNC_TYPE=2 MASTER=false npx hardhat run script/combine_zklink_abi.js
scripts.flatten-all: npm run flatten-origin-master && npm run flatten-origin-slaver && npm run flatten-nexus-master && npm run flatten-nexus-slaver
